sentences.en: Doran stuck his head out of the window to acknowledge the cheering.
sentences.cn: 多兰将头探出窗户向欢呼的人们致谢。

sentences.en: He folded the papers and stuck them in his desk drawer.
sentences.cn: 他将文件叠起来，塞进自己的书桌抽屉里。

sentences.en: He rolled down his window and stuck his face out.
sentences.cn: 他摇下车窗，把头探了出去。

sentences.en: He said his car had got stuck in the snow.
sentences.cn: 他说他的汽车陷在了雪地里。

sentences.en: He should have stuck to his guns and refused to meet her.
sentences.cn: 他本应坚持己见，拒绝与她会面。

sentences.en: He stuck out his tongue and flared his nostrils.
sentences.cn: 他伸出舌头，鼻翼扇动着。

sentences.en: I don't want to get stuck in another job like that.
sentences.cn: 我不想陷入另一份那样的工作中。

sentences.en: I walked over to the mirror and stuck my tongue out.
sentences.cn: 我走到镜子前面伸出舌头。

sentences.en: Many over 30s feel stuck in a financial rut.
sentences.cn: 很多超过30岁的人都觉得自己的经济状况很难有所改变。

sentences.en: Sara tried to open the window but it was stuck.
sentences.cn: 萨拉想打开窗户，但窗户卡住了。

sentences.en: She made a face and stuck out her tongue at him.
sentences.cn: 她做了个鬼脸，向他吐了吐舌头。

sentences.en: That song has stuck in my head for years.
sentences.cn: 那首歌多年来一直铭记在我心中。

sentences.en: The knife stuck in the ground at his feet.
sentences.cn: 刀扎在了他脚边的地上。

sentences.en: The things that stuck out were his cockiness and his four-letter words.
sentences.cn: 与众不同之处在于他的骄傲自大和满嘴脏话。

sentences.en: They got stuck in a traffic jam.
They will be there to help if you get stuck.
sentences.cn: 如果你遇到难题的话他们会帮助你。

sentences.en: We're stuck in jobs that don't pay very well.
sentences.cn: 我们深陷在工资低廉的工作中。

words.tran_cn: 汽车价目标签的；汽车标签价的
尖刀；难题；张贴物；坚持不懈的人

phrases.tran_cn: 被迫接受；无法摆脱；肩负

trans.tran_cn: 动不了的，被卡住的，被…缠住的，被…难住的，不知所措

trans.tran_en: impossible or unable to move from a particular position

trans.tran_cn: 刺(stick 的过去式及过去分词)
